avatar.wrapper: rounded-full bg-indigo-400 flex justify-center items-center overflow-hidden

commandPalette.wrapper: fixed inset-0 flex justify-center items-center bg-black bg-opacity-50 z-50
commandPalette.input: w-full px-4 py-3 mb-4 border-b rounded-b-none rounded-lg focus:outline-none text-gray-800
commandPalette.listItem: flex gap-2 items-center py-2 px-4 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer text-gray-800 dark:text-white
commandPalette.listItemActive: flex gap-2 items-center py-2 px-4 bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer text-gray-800 dark:text-white

notifications.containerWrapper: pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 bg-opacity-75 overflow-y-auto bg-red z-50
notifications.wrapper: notification transition-all ease-in-out duration-300 gap-4 border-l-4 shadow-xl rounded my-3 flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3
notifications.title: font-bold
notifications.wrapperInfo: bg-blue-100 border-blue-500 text-blue-700 dark:bg-blue-700 dark:border-blue-900 dark:text-white
notifications.wrapperWarning: bg-yellow-100 border-yellow-500 text-yellow-700 dark:bg-yellow-700 dark:border-yellow-900 dark:text-white
notifications.wrapperError: bg-red-100 border-red-500 text-red-700 dark:bg-red-700 dark:border-red-900 dark:text-white
notifications.wrapperSuccess: bg-green-100 border-green-500 text-green-700 dark:bg-green-700 dark:border-green-900 dark:text-white
notifications.emptyMessageContainer: flex w-full h-full items-center justify-center p-4

ping.content: absolute -top-2 -right-2 px-2 py-1 rounded-full bg-red-400 text-white text-xs

statCard.card: bg-gray-100 rounded shadow-md border-gray-400 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-600
statCard.header: mb-3 flex px-6 pt-6 justify-between items-center
statCard.title: flex-shrink-0 opacity-75 font-semibold flex space-x-2 items-center text-sm

content.alertGlobal: rounded my-3 flex items-center justify-between border-l-4 px-4 py-3 shadow-md
content.alertInfo: bg-blue-100 border-blue-500 text-blue-700 dark:bg-blue-700 dark:border-blue-900 dark:text-white
content.alertWarning: bg-yellow-100 border-yellow-500 text-yellow-700 dark:bg-yellow-700 dark:border-yellow-900 dark:text-white
content.alertError: bg-red-100 border-red-500 text-red-700 dark:bg-red-700 dark:border-red-900 dark:text-white
content.alertSuccess: bg-green-100 border-green-500 text-green-700 dark:bg-green-700 dark:border-green-900 dark:text-white
content.badgeGlobal: inline px-2 py-1 text-xs rounded border font-semibold

spinner.spinnerDiv: inline-block h-5 w-5 animate-spin rounded-full border-4 border-solid border-current border-e-transparent align-[-0.125em] text-surface motion-reduce:animate-[spin_1.5s_linear_infinite] dark:text-white

codeBlock.wrapper: bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded my-3 text-sm shadow
codeBlock.header: bg-indigo-400 dark:bg-indigo-800 text-white text-sm px-3 py-2 font-mono flex justify-between items-center

popover.wrapperOpen: left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 transform absolute z-10 w-48 p-4 mt-2 bg-white dark:bg-indigo-600 rounded-lg shadow-lg
popover.title: text-sm font-semibold mb-2

treeView.treeItemSelectedContentWrapper: flex items-center border rounded border-blue-800 bg-blue-100 rounded
treeView.treeItemAnchor: cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-100 px-2 py-0.5 flex-grow flex items-center gap-1
treeView.treeItemSelectedAnchor: cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-100 px-2 py-0.5 flex-grow flex items-center gap-1

listView.wrapper: mt-3 mb-3 overflow-hidden bg-white shadow-sm ring-1 ring-gray-50 dark:ring-gray-800 rounded dark:bg-gray-700
listView.listItem: relative flex items-center px-4 py-4 space-x-2 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-800

dataGrid.containerExpanded: fixed z-50 w-full h-full bg-gray-800/50 top-0 left-0 p-6
dataGrid.cell: whitespace-nowrap px-3 py-4 text-left text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-50

button.global: transition-colors text-center font-semibold py-2 px-4 rounded cursor-pointer whitespace-nowrap flex items-center justify-center gap-2
button.defaultOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-indigo-500 text-indigo-500 dark:text-indigo-100 hover:text-white border border-indigo-500
button.primaryOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-indigo-500 text-indigo-500 dark:text-indigo-100 hover:text-white border border-indigo-500
button.infoOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-blue-500 text-blue-500 dark:text-blue-100 hover:text-white border border-blue-500
button.warningOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-yellow-600 text-yellow-500 dark:text-yellow-200 hover:text-white border border-yellow-500
button.errorOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-red-600 text-red-500 dark:text-red-100 hover:text-white border border-red-500
button.successOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-green-600 text-green-500 dark:text-green-200 hover:text-white border border-green-500

dialog.window: relative top-10 mx-auto bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 p-6 rounded shadow-xl
dialog.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-75 overflow-y-auto h-full w-full
dialog.placement: flex items-center min-h-full justify-center p-4 sm:items-center sm:p-0
dialog.header: flex justify-between items-center mb-3 pb-2 border-b border-b-gray-200 dark:border-b-gray-500

dataGrid.headerCell: px-3 py-3.5 text-left text-sm font-semibold cursor-pointer
dataGrid.cell: whitespace-nowrap px-3 py-4 text-sm text-left text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-50

pager.buttonActive: py-2 px-3 rounded text-sm bg-indigo-500 text-white cursor-pointer

tabNav.wrapper: flex items-center gap-2 my-2 rounded bg-gray-100 border-t-2 border-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-800

forms.label: text-left block mb-1
forms.textBox: px-3 py-2 rounded text-gray-900 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white w-full
forms.selectInput: px-3 py-2 rounded text-gray-900 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white w-full

comboBox.wrapper: relative px-3 py-2 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded w-full
comboBox.dropdownContainer: mt-1 w-full absolute top-100 left-0 bg-gray-900 rounded max-h-96 overflow-y-auto overflow-x-hidden

omniBox.viewer: w-full focus:outline-none px-3 py-2 rounded text-gray-900 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white
omniBox.input: w-full focus:outline-none px-3 py-2 rounded text-gray-900 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white
omniBox.listItem: flex gap-2 items-center py-2 px-4 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer text-gray-800 dark:text-white
omniBox.listItemActive: flex gap-2 items-center py-2 px-4 bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer text-gray-800

wizard.progressBarBackground: rounded-full h-2 bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 relative w-full
wizard.progressBar: rounded-full h-2 absolute left-0 top-0 transition ease-in-out duration-300

flyout.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-75 overflow-y-auto h-full w-full
flyout.placementTop: flex min-w-full place-items-start p-4 text-center sm:p-0
flyout.placementLeft: flex min-h-full justify-start p-4 text-center sm:p-0
flyout.placementRight: flex min-h-full justify-end p-4 text-center sm:p-0
flyout.placementBottom: flex min-w-full place-items-end p-4 text-center sm:p-0
flyout.header: flex justify-between items-center mb-3 pb-2 border-b border-b-gray-200 dark:border-b-gray-500

switch.track: bg-gray-500 relative inline-flex h-6 w-11 flex-shrink-0 cursor-pointer rounded-full border-2 border-transparent transition-colors duration-200 ease-in-out focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-600 focus:ring-offset-
switch.trackSelected: bg-indigo-500 relative inline-flex h-6 w-11 flex-shrink-0 cursor-pointer rounded-full border-2 border-transparent transition-colors duration-200 ease-in-out focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-600 focus:ring-offset-
switch.knob: translate-x-0 pointer-events-none inline-block h-5 w-5 transform rounded-full bg-white shadow ring-0 transition duration-200 ease-in-out
switch.knobSelected: translate-x-5 pointer-events-none inline-block h-5 w-5 transform rounded-full bg-white shadow ring-0 transition duration-200 ease-in-out

overlay.wrapper: fixed inset-0 bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-75 overflow-y-auto h-full w-full

accordion.foldHeader: font-semibold bg-indigo-400 dark:bg-indigo-800 p-3 cursor-pointer flex gap-4 items-center
accordion.foldHeaderSelected: font-semibold bg-indigo-300 dark:bg-indigo-700 p-3 cursor-pointer flex gap-4 items-center
